discussion.content: for vCenter 6.5 only postgress is supported
PostgreSQL is the only supported database for vCenter Server appliance 6.5. There is no external database for vCenter server appliances 6.5

questions.question_text: Which database is supported for the vCenter Server Appliance 6.5?

choices.B: The ESXi host had an unsuccessful failover event in vSphere HA.
choices.C: The VM was removed from the vCenter Server.
choices.A: The VM was unregistered from the ESXi host directly.
choices.D: The VM had an unsuccessful migration within a vSphere DRS cluster.

discussion.content:
Answer A & B: Virtual machines can become orphaned if a host failover is unsuccessful, or when the virtual machine is unregistered directly on the host.
Source: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.5/com.vmware.vsphere.troubleshooting.doc/GUID-BFD8C9BC-30FB-4A92-AFEC-2FC9FF387920.html

questions.question_text: Which two scenarios can cause a VM to appear orphaned in the vSphere Web Client? (Choose two.)
